description: This file defines a Java class 'ContextNative' that encapsulates various context variables used in Java code generation for some IPC (Inter-Process Communication) components. It contains fields for filenames, function names, and mappings of variable names to getter/setter functions, serving as a configuration or context container during code generation.

classes.name: ContextNative
classes.description: A class that holds context information such as filenames, function names, and variable-function mappings for Java code generation related to IPC components.

methods.name: ContextNative
methods.description: Constructor initializing hash maps for get/set function mappings.

methods.name: wasGenerated
methods.description: Checks if either the header or source filename has been set, indicating generation.

methods.name: getDestroyFromListFunctionName
methods.description: Gets the function name used to destroy list items.

methods.name: setDestroyFromListFunctionName
methods.description: Sets the function name used to destroy list items.

methods.name: getDestroyFromMapFunctionName
methods.description: Gets the function name used to destroy map items.

methods.name: setDestroyFromMapFunctionName
methods.description: Sets the function name used to destroy map items.

methods.name: addGetFunction
methods.description: Maps a variable name to a getter function name.

methods.name: getGetFunctionForVar
methods.description: Retrieves the getter function name for a variable.

methods.name: addSetFunction
methods.description: Maps a variable name to a setter function name.

methods.name: getSetFunctionForVar
methods.description: Retrieves the setter function name for a variable.
